bgDescription: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.
description: Allows the selected Resonators in the team to regain 20 Concerto Energy when releasing Intro Skills within 60s.  Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Allows the selected Resonators in the team to regain 20 Concerto Energy when releasing Intro Skills within 60s.  Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
